This document provides a brief introduction to the R package **AppSecret** (Secrets managed for R Applications and Libraries). The package provides the R6 class `app_secret` which provides management of paths, creating keys and encryption/decryption wrapping functions from `PKI`. It is primarily designed to work with PEM format private keys and store encrypted files in home directories and application/library repositories.
